```{r}
data_train <- read.csv("var_19_train.csv")
data_test <- read.csv("var_19_test.csv")
head(data_train)

```

```{r}
model <- glm(output~., data = data_train)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
model <- step(model, steps = 4)
```
```{r}
require(ROCR)


```
```{r}
bound <- 0.5098
data_test$score <- predict(model, type = "response", data_test)

output <- rep(0, length(data_test$score))
output[which(data_test$score > bound)] <- 1

output <- as.data.frame(output, colnames = "output")

write.csv(output, file = "output.csv", quote = F, row.names = F)
```
